channel.title: Need WebDesigner!
channel.description: -===Need a Website Designer===- I am in need of a professional website designer! We need it to look nice and make it easy for players to navigate through it! We have an Demonvps Website with a domain but we aren't advanced with websites! So if you could help add me on Skype at apeface11 or reply below! Thanks for your help! :D

item.title: Need WebDesigner!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

There’s no way this post belongs in development teams. At the same time it doesn’t really belong here either. Just going to lock it, it’s a pointless topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Need WebDesigner!
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

I bet I can link you to like 10 threads in this section that are not locked making requests. Does that still means it’s against the rules or that the staff are not doing their jobs? You tell me.

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,652931.msg4374982.html#msg4374982
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,639757.msg4311929.html#msg4311929
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,640908.msg4318231.html#msg4318231
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,625092.msg4255868.html#msg4255868
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,600562.msg4217325.html#msg4217325

etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Need WebDesigner!
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“Ashi, post:9, topic:543714”][quote author=The Web Guy link=topic=662592.msg4428705#msg4428705 date=1402150516]

This isn’t the correct section. But feel free to add me on Skype if you have questions. aj.cordio

Where else would you post it? Request are permitted as far as I know in this section for web.

I’m pretty sure it goes in the Server Development section, not positive though. This is looking for a website developer, not website help.

It’s not a server though.

If they’re looking for a web designer for a RSPS, then it’s RSPS related and belongs in Dev. Teams.

But they haven’t mentioned rsps

Stop trying to argue just because. If they don’t mention what this game is for, then the post is uninformative and shouldn’t be here anyways.
[/quote]
Then you should stop assuming things.[/quote]

I don’t see anything in this description that involves asking for a website developer.

And checkout this thread: What’s allowed in this board?

That concludes my argument, I’m not going to argue like a ten year old over something so foolish.

Edit: Here is a quote from the “Development Teams” section that states what is allowed in that board.

[quote=“Taharok, post:1, topic:297296”][ul][li]You need to provide some sort of evidence that your development team will be successful (ie, pictures).[/li]
[li]Your work must be your own. Stealing other people’s work is unacceptable and isn’t tolerated here.[/li]
[li]Absolutely no advertising is allowed in this section. It is simply for recruiting people for your development team. You may discuss development here with your team, as well as discuss other features you plan on developing.[/li]
[li]If you are going to post a website, you must first get it approved with an Administrator or a Global Moderator. Failure to do this will result in an infraction for advertising.[/li][/ul][/quote]

It seems to me as if OP is trying to recruit someone for his development team.

Read full topic
